MDX is markdown for the component era. It lets you write JSX embedded inside markdown. It’s a great combination because it allows you to use markdown’s often terse syntax (such as
) for the little things and JSX for more advanced components.
Adds syntax highlighting to code blocks in markdown files using PrismJS.
